His issue is that his phone is up to date. I am having the same issue. It says it cannot download the device utility app as it's for an older version of Android. How am I suppose to set the Google home hub??? Google Pixel 8 pro andriod v14
3 weeks ago
Yep, same problem here with a Pixel 7 (and an older Pixel 3a). Apparently you can't set up a new Nest device with a Pixel? Thanks for being a loyal Google device customer, I guess.
Friday
Jennifer are you all working on a solution for this?
I am also having the same issue. Just purchased a new Nest mini for the second floor in my townhouse. I am getting the same message that I need the utility app but that the app is made for an older version android phone.
I also purchased Nest doorbell and Nest camera and I was able to add these items just fine. It is insane that this is happening for the most simple smart speaker. Google can you please help us out with a solution?? We are a Google/Pixel household I have no other way to add my Nest mini.
Tuesday
I just got a new nest mini, my 4th one and I am not able to set it up due to my Pixel 7 being newer than the app. I've no issue setting up any device until today. I have 3 other nest minis, cameras and a doorbell.

I have a Pixel 7 and I am having the same problem, can't download the device utility app as it says it's made for older phone models? How do I set up/activate my google nest mini then when the Google Home app tells me to use the device utility app first?
a week ago
Same problem here. Pixel 7a and new nest mini. Can't setup because my phone is too "new". How crazy is this?
Horrible user experience by Google.
A solution should be given promptly.
